other_title: ひとりじめマイヒーロー

#4: "TRUE LOVE Masahiro Setagawa ver. (TRUE LOVE 勢多川正広ver.)" by Masahiro Setagawa (Toshiki Masuda) (eps 4, 11)
#5: "TRUE LOVE Kousuke Ooshiba ver. (TRUE LOVE 大柴康介ver.)" by Kousuke Ooshiba (Tomoaki Maeno) (eps 5, 10)
#6: "TRUE LOVE" by Kousuke Ooshiba (Tomoaki Maeno), Masahiro Setagawa (Toshiki Masuda) (ep 7)
#7: "TRUE LOVE" by Asaya Hasekura (Shinnosuke Tachibana), Kensuke Ooshiba (Yoshitsugu Matsuoka) (ep 8)
